CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 1, 1941, pg. 19 reads: "October 21 ended a 30-day fasting month for the Mohammedan faith called Fater. There will be two more fasts and then the Mohammedan New Year, 1361. Pictured here are some of the people of the Mohammedan faith feasting, taken at 125 Erin street. Many other members attended. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Muslim women and men, including Kabi Mubarak at head of table, gathered for feast in celebration of the end of the Fater fast, in home at 125 Erin Street, Hill District
